mapper.insert:
insert into res_pic_house
sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, pic_code, pic_name, pic_file_name, pic_type, pic_size, pic_weight, pic_high, pic_suffix, pic_level, pic_format, pic_path, pic_desc, pic_ordering, att1, att2, att3, att4, att5, att6, date_att1, date_att2, num_att1, num_att2, num_att3, num_att4, remark,
#{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picOrdering,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateAtt1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateAtt2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{numAtt1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numAtt2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numAtt3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{numAtt4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
select
FROM res_pic_house where 1=1 AND id < #{id} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

select
FROM res_pic_house where 1=1 AND id > #{id} ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1
